DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether N-acetylcysteine is effective in the treatment or prevention of the foot ulcers in diabetic patients.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of N-acetylcysteine on Diabetic Foot Oxygenation
DOC.criteria: Age between 45 and 70 years. Type 1 or 2 diabetes mellitus with foot ulcer (grade 0 stage C according to Texas University Classification). Written informed consent. Nacetylcysteine assumption in the 6 months previous to the study. Hypersensibility to acetylcysteine. Neoplasms, severe systemic, hepatic, pulmonary, cardiovascular or renal diseases. Psychiatric diseases or drug abuse problems.
